thread.title: What goes into an ASU Football road trip?
thread.title_full: What goes into an ASU Football road trip?

title: What goes into an ASU Football road trip?
text:
What goes into an ASU Football road trip? If you thought moving houses was difficult, imagine moving a football team. Post to Facebook What goes into an ASU Football road trip? If you thought moving houses was difficult, imagine moving a football team.   12news.com: http://12ne.ws/1Lw4zuI   Join the Conversation To   What goes into an ASU Football road trip? Robby Baker , 12 Sports 11:41 a.m. MST October 15, 2015 What ASU Football takes on the road KPNX If you thought moving houses was difficult, imagine moving a football team. Oct 10, 2015; Tempe, AZ, USA; Arizona State Sun Devils quarterback Mike Bercovici (2) takes a snap against the Colorado Buffaloes during the second half at Sun Devil Stadium. The Sun Devils won 48-23. Mandatory Credit: Joe Camporeale-USA TODAY Sports (Photo: Joe Camporeale-USA TODAY Sports) 2 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Nobody likes moving. 
All the boxes, the stress and if you're like me, all the double and triple checking. 
It's never fun, and hopefully something you don't have to do too often, unless you're working for the Sun Devil football team. 
Imagine all the hassles of moving, and doing it about seven times a year! 
That's exactly what the football equipment operations staff does for every Sun Devil road game. 
"It's quite possibly everything you could imagine from rain coats, cold weather coats, to extra gloves and jerseys, extra helmets, extra cleats. It's everything you could need and more," said ASU Football Equipment Operations Coordinator Jerry Neilly. 
Neilly said the work is hard and the hours are long, but it's a job he wouldn't give up for the world. 
"You get to act like a kid, you're around twenty year olds all day, makes you feel young," said Neilly. 
Perhaps my favorite thing the team travels with is a trunk full of snacks. 
Neilly says the trunk is full with everything from gum to cookies to crackers, whatever the team wants. 
ASU football also travels with their locker room. 
How you might ask? 
Well Neilly and his team replicate all the signage from ASU's home locker room and take all the replicas on the road. Players also will have all the pictures and memorabilia they have in their home locker on the road. 
Neilly's staff even takes the same air fresheners on the road, so the locker room smells the same. 
There's nothing this guy doesn't think of. 2 CONNECT 1 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://12ne.ws/1Lw4zuI TOP VIDEOS
